price: 11. (Sebagai) rezeki bagi hamba-hamba (Kami), dan Kami hidupkan dengan (air) itu negeri yang mati (tandus). Seperti itulah terjadinya kebangkitan (dari kubur).
arabic: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: riz'qan lil'ʿibādi wa-aḥyaynā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika al-khurūju
